Oyun amacı katilseniz dört kurbanı öldürmek.Hayatta kalmaya çalışansanız katilden başarılı bir şekilde kaçmak.
Birçok farklı katil var. Dizi, film ve ünlü kişileri katil olarak oyuna aktarmışlar bu da oyuna farklı bir zevk katmış.

Oyun süresi en fazla 16 dakika sürüyor. Bu çevrimiçi bilgisayar oyunlarında az rastlanan bir durum yani sıkıldıysanız tek yapmanız gereken katilden kaçar gibi yapıp katile yakalanmak böylece sizi şikayet eteler bile ceza yemiyorsunuz.

I bought and reviewed this game once in 2020 when Pyramid Head came out. I have played it as much as I could in my free time as a full time employee and gym rat. I don't find a lot of time to play games but when I do I have one that I go to for comfort. This was that game for some time. A lot has changed since recent updates, and well...

I genuinely want to love this game. But, unfortunately as more and more content came out with new perks and new metas, a seemingly never ending grind, badly thought out SBMM (Skill Based Match Making), and a VERY toxic community I find it hard to keep playing some nights. Even with all the controversy with BHVR as a whole, I am growing tired of it all. I don't have as many hours sunk into the game as some and I'm sure someone will point it out but believe me, as fun as this game can be it can be just as frustrating if not more so. I can't in good conscious recommend this game, at least not right now. If you want to play it competitively, you have to sink some money and a lot of time into this game if you want to enjoy it. You might as well just put it on the back burner until you acquire the perks that'll keep you from being tunneled as a survivor or being gen rushed as a killer.

TL;DR: It used to be fun, now you have to sink money and time to play (for lack of a better term) dirty to get any enjoyment out of it. Community can be toxic too.

Короче. Сначала ты нифига не будешь понимать и долго искать пати.
Потом, ранге на 17-15, ты станешь болью всех сурвов, потому что они тупые, а ты прочухал как и что работает.
А потом всё сломается.
Ранги от 17 до 1, ждать то миллионы лет, то 5 секунд, игроки то всратые токсики с тикающим фонарём, то полный нубятник.

Второй вариант этой же игры - сначала ман будет иметь тебя как хочет, а через некоторое время ты его.

Третий вариант - в пачке с такими же дибилами как ты можно круто проводить время. Не важно выиграете вы или нет, но поржёте точно.
10 багов из 10)

best horror game

Excellent game, despite a few flaws. Easily the best asymmetrical multiplayer game out at time of writing. The grind for currency can be daunting, but the variety of killers is staggering.

Dodged most of the flaws that killed Evolve (Goodnight sweet prince) and the content flow is constant. The sheer number of DLC packs is getting pretty nuts by now, but sales are frequent. Would only recommend purchasing a DLC if you are super keen on the killer and survivors (their perks at least) in it. If not, most characters can be purchased separately. 

Go look up Otzdarva on YT for actual smart man guides.
